content.query:
--Create Views on External tables

--CSV

CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_ElectricVehicle
AS
SELECT *
FROM dbo.ElectricVehicle_Ext_table;

SELECT * FROM vw_ElectricVehicle

--Parquet

CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_CovidTracking_Ext
AS
SELECT *
FROM dbo.CovidTracking_Ext_table;

SELECT * FROM dbo.vw_CovidTracking_Ext;
